item.title: 特朗普关税让国际股市再次伟大
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策给国际股市带来了严重的提振，同时也帮助结束了标准普尔500指数（S&P 500 Index）在全球的主导地位— 至少目前是这样。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs are giving international stocks a serious lift and at the same time helping to end the S&P 500 Index’s run of global dominance — at least for now.】

item.title: 奇货可居：玛丽-戴利谈阿拉斯加作为美国领先指标（播客）
item.description: 阿拉斯加州是总部位于旧金山的美联储第 12 区的其中一个州。对于旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）来说，阿拉斯加州目前是美国整体经济的领先指标。在安克雷奇的一次美联储巡回采访中，戴利向我们讲述了她从该州企业中了解到的情况，这些情况与美国其他地区经济的关系，以及她如何利用在当地了解到的情况为货币政策提供最佳指导。我们还将了解到她的重大计划【原文：Alaska is one of the states in the Federal Reserve’s 12th District, which is headquartered in San Francisco. For Mary Daly, the president of the SF Fed, the state right now is a leading indicator for the US economy overall. In an interview recorded on a Fed tour in Anchorage, Daly tells us what she’s learning from businesses in the state, how it relates to the rest of the US economy, and how she uses what she’s learning on the ground in order to best guide monetary policy. We also get her big pi】

item.title: 以色列将占领加沙城，但不会全面接管
item.description: 以色列表示，它将控制加沙城；此举可能使生活在那里的一百万巴勒斯坦人流离失所；以色列无视国内对剩余人质命运的担忧和国际社会对飞地人道主义局势的强烈抗议。【原文：Israel said it will take control of Gaza City — a move that could displace 1 million Palestinians living there — defying domestic concerns over the fate of the remaining hostages and an international outcry over the humanitarian situation in the enclave.】

item.title: 爱尔兰威士忌制造商在特朗普的贸易关税下一蹶不振
item.description: 当基尔拉尼酿酒公司（Killarney Brewing & Distilling Co.）在 2022 年扩建时，它曾自诩为爱尔兰最大的独立啤酒和威士忌生产商，并设有游客中心。上个月，它倒闭了，成为短暂繁荣的最新牺牲品。【原文：When the Killarney Brewing & Distilling Co. expanded in 2022, it boasted of being Ireland’s largest independently owned beer and whiskey producer, replete with visitor center. Last month, it closed down, the latest casualty of a short-lived boom.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯即将达成40亿英镑英国养老金脱售协议
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）即将达成一项协议，将其英国养老金转移给一家保险公司，此举将使这家飞机发动机制造商的资产负债表上减少近 40 亿英镑（54 亿美元）的负债。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc is nearing a deal to offload its UK pension pot to an insurer, a move that would take almost £4 billion ($5.4 billion) in liabilities off the aircraft engine maker’s balance sheet.】

item.title: 美联储哈特内特称美股反弹停滞受资金外流影响
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）表示，投资者正从美国股市撤出资金，涌入现金基金，因为人们再次担心全面关税会抑制经济增长。【原文：Investors are pulling money from US equities and flocking into cash funds, Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett said, amid renewed concerns that sweeping tariffs are crimping economic growth.】

item.title: 日本监管机构敦促地区银行做好准备应对存款争夺战
item.description: 日本金融监管机构的新任负责人向地区银行传达了一个信息：不要依赖利率上升来解决你们的问题。【原文：The new chief of Japan’s financial regulator has a message for regional banks: don’t rely on rising interest rates to fix your problems.】

item.title: 南非卡冈亚戈表示，CPI 接近 3% 将带来更低利率
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克甘亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，预计未来几个月通胀将加快，然后降温，如果通胀维持在当前水平，其预测利率将降低。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said inflation is expected to quicken over the next couple of months before cooling and that if it holds at current levels its forecasts predict lower interest rates.】

item.title: 债务到期在即，钻石开采商勾勒再融资计划
item.description: 钻石开采集团 Petra Diamonds Ltd. 在与贷款方进行了几个月的谈判后，宣布了一项债务再融资计划。【原文：Diamond mining group Petra Diamonds Ltd. has announced a plan to refinance its debt after several months of negotiations with lenders.】

item.title: 欧洲科技股错过人工智能热潮，盈利表现不佳
item.description: 在过去的六个月里，欧洲科技股的表现远远逊于美国科技股，这主要归咎于它们的盈利势头较弱。【原文：European technology stocks are woefully underperforming their US peers over the past six months, and their much weaker earnings momentum is to blame.】

item.title: SBI 零售信贷强劲增长带动利润增长
item.description: 印度国家银行公布的第一季度利润好于预期，原因是信贷增长强劲，高于行业平均水平。【原文：State Bank of India reported better-than-expected profit for the first quarter, driven by strong credit growth above the industry average.】

item.title: 台湾对美贸易顺差仅 7 个月就创下年度纪录
item.description: 由于全球人工智能的蓬勃发展刺激了对台湾科技产品的需求，台湾对美国的贸易顺差在短短七个月内就超过了全年记录。【原文：Taiwan’s trade surplus with the US exceeded its full-year record in just seven months, as a global boom in artificial intelligence fuels demand for its tech products.】

item.title: 土耳其在逮捕资深记者后封锁其 YouTube 频道
item.description: 土耳其法院裁定封杀因被控威胁雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统而被捕的独立记者法提赫-阿尔塔伊利在 YouTube 上的热门频道。【原文：A Turkish court ruled to block the popular YouTube channel of Fatih Altayli, an independent journalist arrested on charges of threatening President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.】

item.title: 前银行家起诉巴克莱银行，称一句玩笑话害他丢了工作
item.description: 一位前巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）投资银行家起诉该银行不公平解雇他，称一句断章取义的评论让他丢掉了工作。【原文：An ex-Barclays Plc investment banker sued the bank for unfair dismissal alleging that an offhand comment taken out of context cost him his job.】

item.title: 土耳其航空公司计划对欧罗巴航空公司股份进行有约束力的竞购
item.description: 土耳其航空公司计划提交一份有约束力的报价，收购欧洲航空公司的少数股权，寻求通过这家专门从事从西班牙飞往欧洲以及拉丁美洲和加勒比海等海外市场的航空公司扩大其业务范围。【原文：Turkish Airlines plans to submit a binding offer for a minority stake in Air Europa, seeking to expand its reach with a carrier that specializes in flights from Spain across Europe and to overseas markets like Latin America and the Caribbean.】

item.title: 中国是取代俄罗斯石油影响全球价格的关键
item.description: 华盛顿扼制俄罗斯石油流向印度的努力提出了这样一个问题：每天数百万桶的石油原本会流向印度次大陆，现在该怎么办？【原文：Washington’s efforts to choke Russian oil flows to India are raising the question of what will happen to the millions of barrels a day that would otherwise have been headed to the subcontinent.】

item.title: 据说 Torrent Gas 考虑在孟买首次公开募股 4.5 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度 Torrent Gas 有限公司正在考虑在孟买进行首次公开募股，可能会募集到约 4.5 亿美元的资金。【原文：India’s Torrent Gas Ltd. is considering an initial public offering in Mumbai that may raise about $450 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克将从 mRNA 诉讼和解中获得 5 亿美元赔偿
item.description: CureVac NV 公司与美国辉瑞公司（Pfizer Inc.【原文：CureVac NV has settled a long-running patent dispute over mRNA vaccines with Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE in the US, which will see CureVac’s former collaborator GSK Plc receive as much as $500 million and 1% of royalties from future vaccine sales.】

item.title: 中国需求帮助津巴布韦将烟草销量提升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在本周四结束的烟草销售季中，津巴布韦的烟草销售额猛增 48%，达到创纪录的 11 亿美元，这主要得益于中国需求的增长。【原文：Zimbabwe’s tobacco sales jumped 48% to a record $1.1 billion in the season that ended Thursday, helped by rising demand from China.】

item.title: 交易商等待特朗普与普京会谈，欧洲天然气走低
item.description: 由于市场参与者在等待美国和俄罗斯领导人之间的会晤，欧洲天然气价格每周都在下跌，这次会晤可能会决定能源贸易政策的未来方向。【原文：European natural gas prices headed for a weekly decline as market participants await a meeting between US and Russian leaders, which could determine the future direction of energy trade policies.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀率超预期，支持谨慎加息
item.description: 由于食品和能源成本上升，匈牙利的通货膨胀率降幅低于预期，这支持了央行货币政策谨慎的论点。【原文：Hungary’s inflation rate dropped less than expected due to rising food and energy costs, bolstering arguments for the central bank’s monetary-policy caution.】

item.title: 中国股市市值因资金流入接近分水岭水平
item.description: 由于资金流入强劲，沪深证券交易所的总市值正朝着 100 万亿元（13.9 万亿美元）的里程碑水平攀升。【原文：The combined market capitalization of the Shanghai and Shenzhen stock exchanges is climbing toward a milestone level of 100 trillion yuan ($13.9 trillion) on strong fund inflows.】

item.title: 新交所濒临上市复兴，30 家 IPO 在列
item.description: 新加坡交易所（Singapore Exchange Ltd.）的一位高层管理人员表示，该交易所有大约 30 家公司正在寻求上市，这表明新加坡这个奄奄一息的新股票上市市场即将迎来转机。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. has a pipeline of about 30 companies looking to go public, according to one of the bourse’s top executives, signaling that the city-state’s moribund market for new equity listings is about to turn a leaf.】

item.title: 泰航盈利大增，股价飙升至七年新高
item.description: 泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International Pcl）的股价攀升至近八年来的最高水平，因为这家国有控股航空公司报告称，第二季度的净收入比去年同期飙升了近 39 倍。【原文：Thai Airways International Pcl’s shares climbed to the highest level in almost eight years after the state-controlled airline reported that net income for the second quarter soared nearly 39-fold from a year earlier.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国央行出人意料，股市和英镑保持稳定
人工智能芯片需求持续增长，台积电七月销售额增长 26
item.description: 台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. reported a 26% growth spurt in July, adding to evidence of accelerating spending on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂面临党内压力，领导地位岌岌可危
item.description: 日本首相石破茂（Shigeru Ishiba）在上个月的上议院选举中成绩惨淡，削弱了他的执政地位，并引发了一些取代他担任领导人的内部势头。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is set to take further criticism from his own party in a plenary meeting that began Friday, following a dismal result in an upper house election last month that has weakened his mandate and triggered some internal momentum to replace him as leader.】

item.title: 特朗普要求辞职，英特尔首席执行官称获董事会支持
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武说，他得到了公司董事会的全力支持，首次回应了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普因利益冲突要求他辞职的呼吁。【原文：Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan said he’s got the full backing of the company’s board, responding for the first time to US President Donald Trump’s call for his resignation over conflicts of interest.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势再现，新兴市场资产涨势受阻
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势再次出现，且下周将有关键数据公布，新兴市场资产周五在亚洲的反弹停滞不前。【原文：A rally in emerging-market assets stalled in Asia Friday as trade tensions with the US resurface and with key data due next week.】
